name: WaveRider (Ziszle)
description:
A game created for INAT gamejam 2!

Unfortunately due to limited time, and limited skill the game is in an uncompleted state.

Unable to get various systems working, Myself and EgyptianSpaceDog (Dylan) decided it would be better to release a piece of software which delivered something rather than nothing.

Therefore I sorted out a form of start screen that endlessly loops. Hopefully, the experiences learnt during this jam can be built upon and skills improved for next time.

ROLES

Ziszel - Programming, Music

EgyptionSpaceDog - Art, Music

------------------------

NOTE

The game was created using the D language and raylib (with the d bindings (raylib-d) on Linux. Being fairly new to Raylib I had not yet created an executable, and I unfortunately could not get it working on any other machine.

Therefore I have uploaded a video which demonstrates what the final product looks like and how it sounds. You can watch the video here:


UPDATE

----------------------------

WaveRider.zip was uploaded AFTER the deadline of the jam. It contains the resources created, and code written during the jam since the executable is garbage.
